alert.note: Alert for Henderson; Mercer (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 17 at 1:07PM CDT until further notice by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Quad Cities IA IL has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Iowa...Illinois... Mississippi River at Keithsburg affecting Des Moines, Henderson, Mercer and Louisa Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is expected in the next 4 days * WHERE...Mississippi River at Keithsburg. * WHEN...From Thursday morning until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 13.5 feet, Water is over the local access road to summer cottages in the Huron Township. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:30 PM CDT Monday the stage was 13.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Thursday morning and continue rising to 15.4 feet Monday morning. Rises are expected to continue until at least early May. - Flood stage is 14.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Stay tuned to further developments by listening to your local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for further information.
